column9: Fuka defeated Natsuki☆Head in the finals of a tournament to become the inaugural champion.

column7: {{sort|4th Junior All-Star Game|''4th Junior All-Star Game''}}

column9: Title vacated when Taiyo fails to defend it for three months.
Nakajima defeated Hiroyo Matsumoto and Yuri Urai in a three-way Dogfight tournament final to win the vacant title. From this point onward, the title is defended alongside the JWP Junior Championship.

column9: Title vacated due to Hagane surpassing the experience limit for the junior division.

column7: {{sort|Fly High In The 25th Anniversary|''Fly High in the 25th Anniversary''}}
column9: Kimura defeated Yako Fujigasaki in the finals of a four-woman tournament to win the vacant title.
Title separated from the JWP Junior Championship on April 2, 2017.
